title: Didnt not get the Year of the Goat  Icon when i gifted a mystery skin to my friend
body: Yupp the tittle pretty much explains it..

replies.body: so sad.....
I think the event is over now and I definitely gifted in the event, so I think I'll still get it but it's taking forever.
Sometimes, it takes a bit of time for the icon to be granted. :]
I'm still waiting for the icon and I gifted someone at the beginning of the event... :'(
so the events started? i don't have any options to gift any of my friends a "lunar revel mystery box" or is that just a fancy way of saying gift your friend a mystery skin?

Yup, the Lunar Revel has started! 

Sorry for the confusion - yes - it's a mystery skin. There's just a 2x chance to send/receive a Lunar Revel skin.
ayyye thanks for the clarification! i mystery gifted my bae hoping the 2x chance for a LR skin would get her the Jinx skin she wanted. it did, and it ruled.
Its been 5 days for me now and I even gifted the other box just in case... still nothing

I know I am supposed to wait cause it takes a while, but it has been about 3-4 days since I sent the gift. I don't think it should be taking this long. I just want the icon. That's the reason i sent the gift in the first place! :(
I just mystery gifted my friend and did not receive any icon rito welp T-T

The only reason I feel the need to contribute that I also have not received my icon after sending a gift to a friend is that another buddy on my friends list already has his. This leads me to believe that some people have been able to send gifts and get the icon unlocked shortly thereafter. So here we are. In all fairness though, Riot has the purchase history / gifting history  of all players and I have no doubt it will all be sorted out eventually.

IÂ´m still waiting for it.
I gifted 3days ago. why is that icon taking so long?
I buy for my frien mystery gift and dont get icon pls i do it only for icon a get nothing :( {{item:3070}}

Um... me and my friend gifted 2 mystery boxes eachother yesterday: 'Madi' (her username and mine Isis) and didnt receive the, 'The year of the Goat' Icon... we spent 980RP for it... so.. please its really serious.

Still yet to receive mine too as it's been well over 48 hours now... starting to think there's a problem on OCE with them being rolled out to everyone as this has happened to a number of friends of mine too. hopefully Rito can fix this.
did either of you receive a Lunar Revel skin?

No i didnt... ;( but i got justicar syndra which i really like :) but i with the 2nd mystery gift i got rocket girl tristana... i h8 tristana...
And i dont think me and madi received the 2x rate on that day because we both got no lunar revel skin or an icon
Well, the reason that you didn't get the icon was probably because you didn't get a lunar revel skin :\ Sry bro
That's not how this works.... that's not how any of this works...
Its been well over 24 hours for me and I still haven't gotten the icon either. :/

I'm too not happy either, my zodiac is goat and I just wanted to collect more and more Lunar Revel Icons :).
Maybe i bestowed a wrong gift ??? I did that one for 490 RP.

I had gifted a mystery skin to my friend yesterday and I still have not received the icon.
Will it be a 24 hour wait? I sent it last night at about 10PM. 
Is it okay if she received a normal mystery skin, not Lunar Revel?
i didnt recive the goat icon either
Does it have to be a mystery chest for 790 RP or do you also get it from a normal chest for 490 RP?
It can be both :)
I haven't received mine either D: but it should be given to use soon! :3
have you tried logging in and out? thats usually how you get it unless too many people are trying to get it in which case it could take a couple of days for it to register in the system!
So you got the goat icon?
